TopicTitle: How to make decent looking KSP fan video?

Articles.Content:
I just want make good video that give me good YouTube viewership.

I plan to make video about first kerbal about First female kerbonaut Valentina Kerman ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

But i wonder what is best soundtrack and what scene are the best?
If anyone knew the 'secret to popularity' they wouldn't be on the KSP forum. They'd be sipping martini's from the deck of some private yacht.

First of all, *Proper Grammar*

Second, for some reason, despite possibly getting less into copyright troubles, i feel Kevin Macleod music is overused, i respect the guy and music, but a good chunk of his music is everywhere.
